attributes.action: cut all aid from Sudan immediately in response to the dispicable way one of our compatriates, Gillian Gibbons, is being treated abroad.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We demand that the Prime Minister seek proper action in response to the unfolding events in Sudan which has left Gillian Gibbons stuck in an unimaginable and absurd situation. We demand that the Prime Minister cuts all aid from this country to put pressure on Sudan and the UN to change its judicial process and laws and stop this from happening again.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
